text: I vspomni takzhe istoriyu Ibrakhima, kogda on poprosil Allakha pokazat', kak On ozhivlyayet mortvykh. Allakh sprosil Ibrakhima: "Uzheli ty do sikh por ne uveril?" Ibrakhim otvetil, chto on uveril, no khochet uvidet' eto svoimi glazami, chtoby bol'she uspokoilos' yego serdtse. Togda Allakh skazal: " Voz'mi chetyrokh ptits, zarezh' ikh, razrezh' na chasti i pomesti ikh na raznykh kholmakh, a potom pozovi ikh k sebe: oni bystro priletyat k tebe. Znay zhe, Ibrakhim, chto Allakh Vsemogushch i Mudr". Yesli On pozhelayet chto-nibud', to tol'ko skazhet: "Bud'!"- i ono byvayet
